Trade/Device Name(s): QuikResponse™ One Step Midstream Early Pregnancy Test
Submitter Information: Tianjin New Bay Bioresearch Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for QuikResponse™ One Step Midstream Early Pregnancy Test for qualitative urine hCG detection
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter urine test intended for qualitative detection of human Chorionic Gonadotropin (hCG) to indicate pregnancy, in some cases as early as 3 days before the expected period
